body:
Part II - comment by random guy: "I don't even want to think of the bastard who gets to fondle those boobs every day."

TRUER WORDS WERE NEVER SPOKEN IN AN H-MANGA STORY (Mitsuru, you Lucky Bastard).
Wait so are they together as gf or married?

I guess Part 2 is the end? since 3 of them are in relationship but still man im jealous of the guy.....fucking everyday like bunnies with those two would probably felt awesome as hell but then again *reality strikes*
I thought it will have a ntr route
marvelous! the second part,finally! this one has both!
